name: businesswoman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 a woman who works in business, especially one who has a high position in a company: She's a good/shrewd businesswoman.
More examplesFewer examplesAn anonymous businesswoman donated one million dollars to the charity.She has a reputation in the trade as an aggressive businesswoman.If you're going to be a high-powered businesswoman, you've got to dress appropriately.Martha is now one of the region's leading businesswomen, with a chain of successful salons.Currently the only female members of the golf club are a select group of wealthy businesswomen.

Add to word list
a woman who works in business, esp. one with a job in a company
Add to word list
Add to word list
a woman who works in business, especially one with an important position in a company or who owns her own company: We organize networking lunches for businesswomen throughout the city.
a woman who understands a lot about business and making money: a good/shrewd businesswoman See also
businessman
businessperson
